allow: Bash(timeout 90 bash -c 'while true; do sleep 10; result=$(gh run list --limit 1 --json status,conclusion 2>/dev/null | jq -r "".[0] | \""\(.status):\(.conclusion)\""""); echo ""Status: $result""; if [[ ""$result"" == ""completed:success"" ]]; then echo ""SUCCESS!""; exit 0; elif [[ ""$result"" == ""completed:failure"" ]]; then echo ""FAILED""; exit 1; elif [[ ""$result"" =~ completed ]]; then exit 1; fi; done')
